item.description:
Here's the FPA Annual Visit The Lady trip..

OK, let's leave for Sky Acres, 44N for breakfast and maybe a top off. From there, Carmel VOR and down the Hudson River.

We should all be at 44N by 10:00 a.m. for a briefing.

Â 

Circle The Lady, learn the phraseology, take pictures for your facebook pages and bring a friend!

We have between 1000 - 12999 foot window for fixed wing. We will make specific details on the flight at Sky Acres depending on who's flying and what you're flying. Low wing, high wing, fast, slow.

Take the course here if you haven't yet.

http://www.aopa.org/advocacy/articles/2009/091117hudsonsfra.html

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Lunch with The Lady, Hudson River Corridor via 44N
